title.narrative: Special American Business Internship Training (SABIT) Program - Unspecified Activities

description.narrative: The SABIT Program provides business executives with first-hand, sector-specific experience and training in the U.S. economy, thus enabling them to become leaders in market reform and private-sector development in their home countries and promotes the development of business relationships through the exchange of information between U.S. host companies and SABIT participants.

title.narrative: Memorandum of Agreeement Between the USPTO and United Nations Economic Commission for Europe

description.narrative: This document constitutes an agreeement between the USPTO and UNECE Advisory Group on the Protection and Implementation of IPR for Investment to: 1) conduct regional training seminars on IPR enforcement; 2) hold consultative meetings and produce reports on the status of IP protection and enforcement in various countries, and 3) produce various training materials addressing the role of IPR in technical transfer and enforcement of IPR.
